                     throws Exception

        parentCommunityShortName - Parent community short name
        administratorUserId - Admin ID of the community
        organizationShortName - Admin organization short name of the community

        tags - Tags of the group
        members - List uses that want to add
        sendNotification - It indicates whether an email is going to be sent to users telling them that has been added to the group
